name: dynamic-remotes-node
description: Dynamic Remotes on server side with Node Federation

scripts.build:legacy: rimraf dist/server && concurrently 'cd app1; webpack --config ./webpack.config.js' 'cd runtime-container; webpack --config ./webpack.config.js' 'cd app2; webpack --config ./webpack.config.js'
scripts.build: rimraf dist/server && concurrently 'cd app1; rspack --config ./rspack.config.js' 'cd runtime-container; rspack --config ./rspack.config.js' 'cd app2; rspack --config ./rspack.config.js'
scripts.start:legacy: pnpm build:legacy && concurrently 'pnpm serve' 'sleep 5 && node app1/dist/main.js'
scripts.start: pnpm build && concurrently 'TEST=true pnpm serve' 'sleep 5 && node app1/dist/main.js'
